it.polimi.se2019.model

Class MarksTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.model.MarksTracker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class MarksTracker
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    THIS CLASS SHOULD NEVER BE DIRECTLY ACCESSED, INSTEAD USE METHODS FROM THE "Person" CLASS. The MarksTracker class keeps track of the number of marks a player has received from each player in game.
    Author:
    FedericoMainettiGambera, LudoLerma
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • addMarksFrom

        public void addMarksFrom(Player markingPlayer,
                         int quantity)
        add marks. This method uses the MarkSlots.addQuantity(int quantity) method that makes sure that the resulting quantity of marks is never more than GameConstant.MAX_NUMBER_OF_MARK_FROM_PLAYER.
        Parameters:
        markingPlayer - the player who's giving the marks
        quantity - the quantity of marks to be given

      • getNumberOfMarksSlotFrom

        int getNumberOfMarksSlotFrom(Player markingPlayer)
        Parameters:
        markingPlayer - the specific player
        Returns:
        number of marks received from a specific player

      • deleteMarksFromPlayer

        void deleteMarksFromPlayer(Player markingPlayer)
        deletes all marks received from a specific player
        Parameters:
        markingPlayer - the player whose marks are about to be deleted

      • buildMarksTrackerV

        MarksTrackerV buildMarksTrackerV()
        builds the equivalent structure for view purposes
        Returns:
        a reference to said structure
